option.crc_correction_info:
Corrects the CRC checksum of bundle files to prevent the 'Abnormal Client' error after modification.
This option must be enabled for the Steam version; it is not required for mobile versions.
When set to 'Auto', the tool will determine if it's needed based on the target bundle's platform info.
option.padding_info: Appends "0x08080808" to the end of the file.
option.backup_info: Creates a backup before replacing files.
option.compression_method_info:
Sets the compression method for AssetBundle files.
- LZMA: Highest compression ratio
- LZ4: Medium compression ratio
- Original: Same as the source file
- None: No compression
option.replace_texture_info: Image resource files, including character art, model textures, etc.
option.replace_textasset_info: .skel and .atlas files, related to Spine animations.
option.replace_all_info:
Replaces resources of all types.
Experimental, not recommended.
option.spine_conversion_info:
(Optional Extension)
Calls an external program to convert .skel files to a supported version.
Requires configuring the path to the Skel Converter.
option.spine_downgrade_info:
(Optional Extension)
Calls an external program to export files compatible with older Spine versions (.skel and .atlas).
Requires configuring the path to the Skel Converter.
option.game_root_dir_info:
Set the game installation directory to automatically locate original bundle files.
The program can automatically detect the following subdirectories:
- BlueArchive_Data/StreamingAssetsPUB/Resource/GameData/Windows
- BlueArchive_Data/StreamingAssetsPUB/Resource/Preload/Windows
- GameData/Windows
- Preload/Windows
- GameData/Android
- Preload/Android
option.enable_bleed_info:
Applies bleed operations to image files.
Recommended if packed images show black or jagged edges in-game.
option.enable_spine38_name_fix_info:
Fixes the filename format exported by older Spine versions to the new format.
Example: CH0808_home2.png → CH0808_home_2.png
